Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.views

Class CLIHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.views.CLIHandler
public class CLIHandler
extends java.lang.Object
This class visualizes all the information of the player and game board, take the input from the various view handler and send the data to the server
Author:
Mirko Genoni

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    CLIHandler​(ConnectionToServer connection)
    Constructor of the class, initializes all the data structure

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getTmpRoomNumber()  
    void initialResourceSelection​(int numResources, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> depositState)
    This method handles the receive of initial resources, and gives the user the possibility to rearrange them inside the deposit
    void insertInitialData​(java.lang.String DataRequired)
    This method gets from the user all the information needed to start the game and prints the data already received (ip address and port), asks and checks the name of the player, if the room is new, the number of the room, eventually if the room is new and it's the first player the number of players
    boolean isNewRoomOrNot()  
    void leaderCardSelection​(java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCardToClient> received, boolean initial, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> totalReceived, boolean isFinal)
    This method is the first received from the cli and handles the discard or activation of the cards, depending on the user input and the initial boolean, stores then the card received in an attribute of the class so that after the handle of this event are available to the cli.
    void newState​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​PlayerInformationToClient> players, MarketToClient market, DevelopmentCardToClient[][] developmentCardToBuy)
    This method is called after the handle of the leaderCard and updates all the data of all the players and removes from the leader card in hand the one activated, calls then the newTurn() method
    void newTurn()
    This method handles all the various type of turn and send the data to the server -market: take material from the market and checks if a marketWhiteChange leader power is activated, eventually calling the handler of the marketWhiteChange -buydevelopment: the user buys a card from the development card market, calls eventually a handler for the costLess leaderPower -usedevelopment: the user activates one of the development, the base production, the leader additional production or a development card -viewboard: the user can see the boards of all the players
    void printLorenzoTurn​(java.lang.String action, int position)
    This class prints the "decision" made by Lorenzo and his position on the faithTrack
    void selectNewDeposit​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> deposit, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> marketReceived, boolean additional, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> type, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> state)
    This method starts the cli for the rearrangement of the deposit, the check of its correctness is done by the server
    void selectSpaceForDevelopment​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> space)
    This method gives the user the choice to where to postion the development card bought
    void stopAsyncPrint()
    This method stops the animation of waiting other players, created with the class WaitingOtherPlayers

  • Constructor Details

    • CLIHandler

      public CLIHandler​(ConnectionToServer connection)
      Constructor of the class, initializes all the data structure
      Parameters:
      connection - passes to this class the connection to the server, already created

  • Method Details

    • getTmpRoomNumber

      public int getTmpRoomNumber()

    • isNewRoomOrNot

      public boolean isNewRoomOrNot()

    • insertInitialData

      public void insertInitialData​(java.lang.String DataRequired)
      This method gets from the user all the information needed to start the game and prints the data already received (ip address and port), asks and checks the name of the player, if the room is new, the number of the room, eventually if the room is new and it's the first player the number of players
      Parameters:
      DataRequired - is a String that represents the current state and asks the correct information to the user

    • stopAsyncPrint

      public void stopAsyncPrint()
      This method stops the animation of waiting other players, created with the class WaitingOtherPlayers

    • initialResourceSelection

      public void initialResourceSelection​(int numResources, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> depositState)
      This method handles the receive of initial resources, and gives the user the possibility to rearrange them inside the deposit
      Parameters:
      numResources - is the number of initial resources received
      depositState - is the current state of the deposit

    • leaderCardSelection

      public void leaderCardSelection​(java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCardToClient> received, boolean initial, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> totalReceived, boolean isFinal)
      This method is the first received from the cli and handles the discard or activation of the cards, depending on the user input and the initial boolean, stores then the card received in an attribute of the class so that after the handle of this event are available to the cli. If the card are discarded they are removed immediately from the arrayList, if they are activated they will be removed later, because if the server refuse to activate the data of the cards would be lost
      Parameters:
      received - contains the leader card received from the server
      initial - indicates if the cards received the initial
      totalReceived - contains the count of all the development cards and resources
      isFinal - indicates if the leaderCard are sent at the start or end of the turn

    • newState

      public void newState​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​PlayerInformationToClient> players, MarketToClient market, DevelopmentCardToClient[][] developmentCardToBuy)
      This method is called after the handle of the leaderCard and updates all the data of all the players and removes from the leader card in hand the one activated, calls then the newTurn() method
      Parameters:
      players - is a map that contains all the data of all the player's board
      market - contains the state of the market
      developmentCardToBuy - contains the state of the development card store

    • newTurn

      public void newTurn()
      This method handles all the various type of turn and send the data to the server -market: take material from the market and checks if a marketWhiteChange leader power is activated, eventually calling the handler of the marketWhiteChange -buydevelopment: the user buys a card from the development card market, calls eventually a handler for the costLess leaderPower -usedevelopment: the user activates one of the development, the base production, the leader additional production or a development card -viewboard: the user can see the boards of all the players

    • selectNewDeposit

      public void selectNewDeposit​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> deposit, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> marketReceived, boolean additional, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> type, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> state)
      This method starts the cli for the rearrangement of the deposit, the check of its correctness is done by the server
      Parameters:
      deposit - represent the current state of the deposit
      marketReceived - is a map that contains the resources received from the market
      additional - is a boolean that indicates if there is one or more additional deposit activated
      type - contains all the types of material that the additional deposit can contain, its length can be 1 and that represents that there is only one additional deposit active or 2 and that represents that there are 2 deposits activate
      state - represents the current state of the additional deposit

    • selectSpaceForDevelopment

      public void selectSpaceForDevelopment​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> space)
      This method gives the user the choice to where to postion the development card bought
      Parameters:
      space - is an array of 3 spaces that represent if the development card can be positioned in that position

    • printLorenzoTurn

      public void printLorenzoTurn​(java.lang.String action, int position)
      This class prints the "decision" made by Lorenzo and his position on the faithTrack
      Parameters:
      action - represents the action taken by Lorenzo
      position - represents the position of Lorenzo on the board
